org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss
Interface GssConnectionResource

All Superinterfaces:
GssEnabledResource, Resource, ServiceResource
All Known Subinterfaces:
HttpgServiceResource
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGssConnectionResource, BaseHttpgServiceResource
public interface GssConnectionResource
extends ServiceResource, GssEnabledResource

Describes a service resource to which gss secured connections can be made.

Method Summary
 GssConnection createGssConnection(org.ietf.jgss.GSSCredential credential)
          Returns a secure connection for the given credential.

          Returns a gss connection for the given user.

          Destroys the secure srcConnection for the given credential
 void destroyGssConnections(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user)
          Destroys all the secure connections for the given user.
